welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Littleton, a charming town known for its historic Main Street, beautiful parks, and friendly community. We're excited to have you here and invite you to explore and discover all that our city has to offer. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Arapahoe Co Airport offers a variety of amenities and services for passengers.

terminals.name: Private Aviation Terminal
terminals.description: The private aviation terminal at Arapahoe Co Airport provides a luxurious and exclusive experience for private jet travelers.

wifi.note: Passengers can enjoy complimentary WiFi throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Jeffco Airport serves both commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Jeffco Airport caters to private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Passengers can access free WiFi throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Jeppesen Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Denver International Airport, featuring a variety of shops, restaurants, and services for travelers.

terminals.name: Concourse A
terminals.description: One of the three concourses at Denver International Airport, serving domestic and international flights for various airlines.

terminals.name: Concourse B
terminals.description: One of the three concourses at Denver International Airport, serving domestic and international flights for various airlines.

terminals.name: Concourse C
terminals.description: One of the three concourses at Denver International Airport, serving domestic and international flights for various airlines.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport, with options for upgraded speeds available for purchase.
